name: System Reboot
description:
It's 3 AM, you are alone, and the Supercomputer you're in charge of is endlessly rebooting...

Run around the office, try to figure out what's wrong with the computer and how to repair it. But be careful,the security system  is stuck at maximum level, and the security robots are roaming free...

Made for the Ludum Dare 47. Theme: Stuck in a loop
